00074 typedef enum {
00075     SW_ACCESS_DENIED=0x6982,
00076     SW_AUTH_BLOCKED=0x6983,
00077     SW_AVAILABLE=0x6100,
00078     SW_CHANGE_MEMORY_ERROR=0x6581,  // Unused
00079     SW_COUNTER=0x63C0,
00080     SW_EOD=0x6282,  // Unused
00081     SW_FILE_EXISTS=0x6A89,
00082     SW_FILE_FILLED=0x6381,  // Unused
00083     SW_FILE_NOT_FOUND=0x6A82,
00084     SW_FILE_TO_SHORT=0x6A84,
00085     SW_INCOMPATIBLE_FILE=0x6981,
00086     SW_LC_INCONSISTEND_WITH_P1P2=0x6A87,    // Unused
00087     SW_NOT_ALLOWED=0x6986,
00088     SW_NOT_SUPPORTED=0x6A81,    // Unused
00089     SW_OK=0x9000,
00090     SW_OTHER=0x6F00,
00091     SW_REF_DATA_INVALID=0x6984,
00092     SW_REF_DATA_NOT_FOUND=0x6A88,
00093     SW_VERIFCATION_FAILED=0x6300,   // Unused
00094     SW_WRONG_CLA=0x6E00,
00095     SW_WRONG_CONDITION=0x6985,
00096     SW_WRONG_DATA=0x6A80,
00097     SW_WRONG_INS=0x6D00,
00098     SW_WRONG_LE=0x6C00,
00099     SW_WRONG_LEN=0x6700,
00100     SW_WRONG_P1P2=0x6A86,
00101     SW_WRONG_REFERENCE=0x6B00,
00102 } SW;
